Contact Us
Phone:
(850) 351-1817
Fax:
(850) 351-1807
Rum Runners In The Village of Baytowne Wharf
The Village of Baytowne Wharf is alive with energy, festive events, uplifting music, delicious food and spirits. Nowhere is that more true than at Rum Runners®, Sandestin’s premier dining and live entertainment venue. Live music fills the air seven nights a week as crowds sing along and dance with the unmatched performers here at Rum Runners. Our award winning lunch and dinner menus keep customers coming back year after year to enjoy our magical creations including specialties such as, freshly prepared seafood, steaks, chicken, pasta; burgers and other sandwiches; salads; and a variety of appetizers.
Contact Rum Runners

The Village of Baytowne Wharf is alive with energy, festive events, uplifting music, delicious food and spirits. Nowhere is that more true than at Rum Runners®, Sandestin’s premier dining and live entertainment venue. Live music fills the air seven nights a week as crowds sing along and dance with the unmatched performers here at Rum Runners. Our award winning lunch and dinner menus keep customers coming back year after year to enjoy our magical creations including specialties such as, freshly prepared seafood, steaks, chicken, pasta; burgers and other sandwiches; salads; and a variety of appetizers.

Download An Application
You can download an application by clicking the DOWNLOAD button below. Please fill it out to completion and drop it by our location in the Baytowne Wharf; 130 Fisherman’s Cove, Sandestin FL 32550.
Please provide your resume’ with your application.
